price: Is it you who bring it down from the clouds, or is it We Who bring it down?
arabic: ءَأَنتُمۡ أَنزَلۡتُمُوهُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُزۡنِ أَمۡ نَحۡنُ ٱلۡمُنزِلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
